name: Fhacktions
description:
Fhacktions is a mobile game developed by Posibillian Tech, a Paraguayan indie dev studio.

In this game you are a hacker and walk around your city in order to find servers to hack. Servers provide virtual currency and power to help you in the game.

In order to hack servers you will have to use avatars and make them fight in an up to 5vs5 combat. When the server is yours, you can defend it from wherever you are.

Each avatar has dozens of abilities and skins.

To rule the world you will have to team up with other hackers and create or join a faction.
